room_title: Escape room "Legacy Lost" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
review: So much fun. We did Legacy Lost as a private group of 6 people. Barely made it out in time because we got sidetracked a few times. It was a terrific use of brainpower and communication.

room_title: Escape room "Legacy Lost" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
review: This is probably the 4th escape company I've visited and is by far the best in terms of environment, quality of puzzles, and variety of rooms. It's a family run business and the entire family are kind and friendly which only serves to make the entire experience amazing. Definitely worth the drive out to Lee's Summit from Kansas City. I'll be coming back very soon.

room_title: Escape room "Legacy Lost" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
review: This was our 3rd different escape place to try and exit room is by far the best one yet, well put together rooms and great staff. Go check it out!
